name: json-test-utility
description: JSON utility for refactoring, comparing, and migrating json test data.
author: Manyu Lakhotia

scripts.specs-jr: yarn run toJS && node -r ts-node/register node_modules/tape/bin/tape src/spec/JsonRefactor.test.ts | tap-spec
scripts.specs-jc: yarn run toJS && node -r ts-node/register node_modules/tape/bin/tape src/spec/JsonComparer.test.ts | tap-spec
scripts.specs-jmk: yarn run toJS && node -r ts-node/register node_modules/tape/bin/tape src/spec/JsonMasker.test.ts | tap-spec
scripts.specs-jm: yarn run toJS && node -r ts-node/register node_modules/tape/bin/tape src/spec/JsonMigration.test.ts | tap-spec
scripts.specs: yarn run toJS && node -r ts-node/register node_modules/tape/bin/tape src/spec/*.test.ts | tap-spec
